II.iii.4.B.2.h
.
Signature Page Characteristics for Non-Original Claims Submitted Through SEP
Non-original claims submissions by POAs through SEP
do not require claimant or POA signatures, and
may result in a blank signature block on the
VA Form 21-526EZ
.
Note
:Â  Although not required, the POA may choose to use the checkmark solution or upload the signature page.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, Chapter 4, Section B - Stakeholder Enterprise Portal (SEP) Claims
citation: Part II, Subpart iii, Chapter 4, Section B
